channel.title: Softlayer_container_authentication_request_openidconnect on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_container_authentication_request_openidconnect on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_OpenIdConnect
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_OpenIdConnect Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_OpenIdConnect data type contains information for requests to the getPortalLogin API. This class is specific to the SoftLayer Cloud Token login. The request information will be verified to ensure it is valid, and then there will be an attempt to obtain a portal login token in authenticating the user with the provided information. Local openIdConnectAccessToken Type: string openIdConnectAccountId Type: integer
